headline: Eaton (ETN) Shares Pull Back—A Fresh Look at the Stock’s Current Valuation
summary: Shares of Eaton (ETN) have quietly pulled back over the past month, slipping about 9% even as the broader market climbed higher. There is not a headline-grabbing event behind this move, but the decline is likely making investors wonder if something has changed, or if it is an early chance to buy into a durable industrial leader at a better price. For longtime shareholders and curious onlookers alike, this kind of shift can be the spark to take a fresh look at what is (or is not) priced into...
